storyInfo: In a bizarre team-up, the Doctor and W continue looking for the airship's core, only to find an enemy who looks particularly similar to the assassin who murdered Theresa years ago. Now, they are on the Military Commission's side.

attributes.content: I've been wondering when you'd come to see me, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You came too late, and you missed the most beautiful moment.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: The first flower that budded died last night, but look at it now.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: It's full of vigor still.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I see no difference compared to before.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Exactly.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: It was born from the withering, and in an instant it became so healthy and strong.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: *sigh*, if only you were able to witness for yourself this miracle born on top of Originium.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: This garden, built on top of Originium, is the fruit of Theresa's painstaking labor.
Aside from war, the other path that Theresa found for the Sarkaz is close at hand.
But what kind of future does this path lead to?
Ever since you brought the Doctor here, you've been spending more time in the garden.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Babel still has a lot that needs you, our chairman, to handle, but on top of that, you were absent from today's general meeting.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Not only do we have you, we also have the Doctor here now to help us. It's not much of a problem if I take it easy once in a while, isn't it?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I know you, Theresa. You were never one to joke around when it came to important business.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do you know what the Doctor thinks?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: No, I'm not sure what you've heard, but my guess is you do not have our mutual friend's full support.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I won't give up, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: If this is how we're supposed to resolve the predicament that the Sarkaz is facing now, I'll go talk to Theresis.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I will show this path to all the Sarkaz, so that they know we aren't fated to live a vicious cycle of hatred.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Theresa—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, please hear me out first.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I know very well that this could be risky, but I trust you.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: If you find me walking toward an uncontrollable future while I'm on this path, please pull me back.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I know you can do this, even though you always keep your opinions to yourself on many things.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: If you want that future you're hoping for to actually come true, we'll still have to earn the Doctor's support.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When it comes to Originium utilization, the Doctor is... irreplaceable.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But regardless of what awaits us at the end...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...I promise you: when the time comes, I will be there by your side.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Menacing growl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: I got the Doctor. Stop growling.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Heh, relax. I won't let go.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The wind roars in your ears. Through the shattered porthole, you can see The Shard and the devastated battlefield below.
The ceaseless barrage of intense explosions could fling you outside at any moment, and right now, the one who is holding onto your hand... is W.
You don't often see W acting this serious.
(Anxious growl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: I'm trying to think through something actually important, Mon3tr, so quit bothering me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You never really know the old hag, but she'd never take her chances with you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Since she insisted on bringing you along on such a dangerous boarding mission—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We'll definitely need you if we want to see Her Highness and stop this stinking ship.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: *Sarkaz expletive*. I've got no choice but to save you now.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Come on up.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: ...Thank you.;Back then—

attributes.content: Nothing happened back then.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Where do we go now?
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: I can still hear the bombs ticking on my back.

attributes.content: That's for positioning. You can think of the explosion as, like, a bonus function.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If you got swept away, I would've had to find you—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Shit, that reminds me. I should've given the old hag one, too.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Disapproving growl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: It'd be a waste on you, you little freak.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Now figure out which way we gotta go, you empty tin can.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We don't have much time. This stinking ship's about to crash into that weird thing out there...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If I have to die, it's gotta be after I meet Her Highness.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: You've been pretty antsy ever since we got on this ship.

attributes.content: Oh? I saved your ass. You don't think that's me being more emotionally stable than usual?
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: Is it because you're about to meet Theresa?;Is it because you're worried about Hoederer and Ines?;Is it because this is our first date without a third wheel?

attributes.content: I gotta babysit for that old hag and figure out how to bump off that core right now.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I don't have time for a Q&A.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Gah, why would I be worried about those two?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ines knows how to bring back the dead like it's doing laundry.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She'll take care of it.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Don't you even dare to try provoking me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If it wasn't a moment like this, I swear you wouldn't have had the chance to ask that question.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So stop trying to annoy me with your dumb, self-righteous interrogation—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The shadows emerge from the metal. They are everywhere.
The revenant is anywhere and everywhere.
It has already made it in front of W.
You are a Sarkaz, too! Are you turning a deaf ear to the myriad souls' anger and squall?!
attributes.name: Shadow

attributes.content: You shouldn't—
attributes.name: Shadow

attributes.content: Oops, my hand slipped.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Right, you were saying?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hold on, I bet you're here to tell me where Her Highness is, aren't you?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The sound of the metal being torn apart continues. The entire airship is howling.
(Nervously hooks onto your clothes)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: The airship... is angry?;The revenant... is angry?

attributes.content: Hm, looks like it's not really all that rational of a fella...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's a good chance. Can you find out what's the place with the most energy fluctuation on this ship right now?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: That should be where its core is.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: ...;...I don't know how to.

attributes.content: (Looks at W with a mocking expression)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: Hold on. I still have an idea.
Maybe I can figure out which spot shows the highest change in Originium concentration!

attributes.content: Well, then get on it! This asshole's even more impatient than I expected!
attributes.name: W
W
attributes.content: Doesn't look like it'll wait till you're done...

attributes.name: W
attributes.content: Ergh...
Hey, shadow freak, you know how guests are supposed to bring their hosts a gift when they visit?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Catch!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Little freak, you better keep this dipshit safe, or you're gonna get yourself grounded by the old hag.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (High-pitched howl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: This way! But the wall's so thick, the bombs won't blow—

attributes.content: You forgot about this guy, huh?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Based on my tests before, it's got more than just a thick skin.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hold on tight to it, Doctor! I'll give you two a huge fireworks show!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The moment it goes off, let it shield you from the impact and take you to the other side!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You got that, little freak?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Excited howling)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Get ready, then. Three, two, one!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Boom!
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: I can't see very well—;I'm feeling kinda dizzy—

attributes.content: Hur... ry...
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: My ears can't... hear very well...

attributes.content: Hey, {@nickname}, how you feeling now?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I just checked the wall. I guess you guys didn't have to crash into the blast point with such perfect accuracy?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Sorry for making you suffer all that for nothing.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Angrily waves claws)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Watch your claws, little beast. This one here is no match for you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: Mon3tr, I'm okay. Let me down.

attributes.content: You 'look' terrible. Heh, you can drop the act in front of me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You want me to believe you can't take this much? I don't buy it.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: I'm worried about Kal'tsit...;If Amiya's running into these things too...

attributes.content: I don't remember the cat lady being that fragile. She—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (She doesn't gasp for air much anymore, but she hasn't completely recovered yet... and she sent this little freak here...)
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Dejected howl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Alright, stop whining. It pisses me off.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Look how peppy you are. That means the old hag is fine.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ines told me the little bunny's already run into this thing once in Norport.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She's got more experience than any one of us when it comes to dealing with it.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Heh, I bet she's more worried about me offing you rather than the revenant.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Threatening howl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Shut up. The old hag isn't here to back you up now.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The little bunny's gonna be fine. Take my word for it.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: {@nickname}, stop dawdling. Let's go—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Standing in the corridor, W subconsciously looks outside the window and freezes for a moment.
Let's get going. We ain't got time for sightseeing.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You come to the window and look at the battlefield beneath you.
The sky is still lit up by the Sighs of Kings's golden glow. Victoria's counterattack must have started.

attributes.options: Victoria's counterattack has begun.;I hope Rhodes Island will be of help...

attributes.content: Down there is a real hell now. No need to look anymore.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: Were you... saddened by the battlefield?

attributes.content: ...More than enough Sarkaz have died.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Keep up.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I have lots of questions for Her Highness.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Looks around in alarm)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: ...Mon3tr?

attributes.content: (Attacks the ground furiously)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: A dark current of shadows silently appears at your feet and drags you toward the end of the hallway at an incredible speed.
You can feel the tip of a sharp blade at the back of your neck.

attributes.options: There's more than just the revenant here—!

attributes.content: (Low-pitched growling)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: The black tide engulfs the struggling Mon3tr and keeps it from moving.
*Sarkaz expletive*, trying to snatch my mark from under my eyes?!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Angry howling)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Come back!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You see a flash of light within the darkness at the end of the corridor, followed by a loud boom.
The force coming from behind you is so strong that it propels you out of the darkness and straight into the ground.

attributes.options: Ouch!;The bomb on my back?!

attributes.content: How's that? The latest propulsion unit with tracking. Not bad, huh? And like I said, the explosions are just a bonus.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It'll still make you suffer for two or three days, though.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hah, we make a great team, don't we?
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: I never agreed to this team-up!;You could've reminded me beforehand!

attributes.content: It was never your call if or how we were gonna team up.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hey, you in there. Bet that gave you a start, too?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You haven't changed, W.
You cannot go any further.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: And you... Doctor.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.options: You... are alive.
Have we met before?

attributes.content: She remembers the day she returned to Babel.
She remembers that broken door and the blood-stained logo...
And... those assassins hiding under their masks.
They took Theresa's life.
That Theresa.
W finds herself exceptionally calm right now.
You're gonna die.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And it'll be a really horrible death.
attributes.name: W
